modName: Dovahkiin Vs The Champion of Cyrodiil
summary: Ever thought of who would win in a fight between your Skyrim and Oblivion character? well now you can! He is located on top of the Hill right behind Gjukar's monument. UPDATE: Divine Crusader edition is located here as the other file for a more challenging battle. Divine Crusader edition can't be used at same time as the original versio
descriptionHtml:
I created a Lore-friendly Champion of Cyrodiil character who is majorly buffed and will be a challenging fight to characters unless they are really OP. I used weapons that have been used in the Elder Scrolls IV and the armor is to represent the Imperial Dragon armor. This is my first mod so enjoy!
Edit: Newest version is divine crusader version. Includes Custom spells and of course the crusader's relics. (Better version in my opinion)
Note: Feel free to upload photos of your encounters or opinions in the comment section! Also planning on hopefully getting started on version 1.3 in March 2015
author: Jbum26
